abstract: The company said movies that underperformed and a drop in advertising hurt its bottom line.
snippet: The company said movies that underperformed and a drop in advertising hurt its bottom line.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  If the Walt Disney Company, with its vast theme park operations and television advertising business, is a bellwether for swaths of the economy, third-quarter earnings do not bode well for a recovery.

headline.main: Walt Disney Says Profit Fell 26% in Quarter
headline.print_headline: Walt Disney Says Profit Fell 26% In Quarter
